channel.title: google-play-services on Xizhi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in google-play-services on Xizhi's Blog

item.title: Play with Google Play Services - Android Wear
item.description: If you haven’t set up Google Play services yet, please follow this tutorial. Today we demonstrate how to use Android Wear on devices with Android 4.3 or higher and BLE support.

item.title: Play with Google Play Services - Locations
item.description: If you haven’t set up Google Play services yet, please follow this tutorial.

item.title: Play with Google Play Services - Push Notification
item.description: If you haven’t set up Google Play services yet, please follow this tutorial. Today, we demonstrate how to use the cloud messaging / push notification.

item.title: Play with Google Play Services - Map
item.description: If you haven’t set up Google Play services yet, please follow this tutorial.

item.title: Play with Google Play Services - Set Up
item.description: Google has offered a bunch of services that developers can use in their Android apps. In this and following few blog posts, we demonstrate how easy it is to use them. Now, let’s get everything setup.
